description: Sirenhead: Ducks hunt is a horror game about hunting Silenthead! You are playing as a duck detective who needs to find Silenthead and kill that beast.

You are the world famous Mystery P.I. and have been hired to track down and return the lost movie. Seek & Find over 2100 hidden objects in 25 stunning L.A.

Title: Fishing Sim World: Bass Pro Shops Edition
description: Fully endorsed by Bass Pro Shops and featuring an array of your favourite Bass Pro Shops equipment. Choose from 8 glorious US locations from Fishing Sim World and compete in career mode or play your way in multiplayer. An underwater camera will allow you to see the moment the fish strikes lure!

description: Devilish Girl is a Casual Erotic Puzzle game, you reveal 15 devilish girls in increasingly dificulty puzzles.

Title: Twizzle Puzzle: Cats

Title: Brawl Tactics: Origins

description: Take to the skies in Wingsuit: Gudvangen and pursue the daredevil career of a professional wingsuit pilot with the action turned up to 11. Put on one of the wingsuits at your disposal, choose an exit point, and make Gudvangen your playground.

description: An irresistible force has taken our fearless frog to an island where the puzzle-action of Zuma has evolved in amazing ways… but evil spirits and tenacious tiki bosses rule the land! Survive by firing stone spheres to destroy the deadly stream of balls. Conquer over 60 levels!

description: Choco Pixel is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

genre: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Inspection
description: A Single Player, First Person Horror Experience within a mysterious corporate bunker. Play as a military inspector and uncover the secrets the corporation is hiding while safeguarding your own survival against the robotic mysteries lurking deep within the facilities confines.

Title: Mech Shuffle
description: Mech Shuffle is a unique perfect information card battler. Choose your PILOT and your MECH to build your deck. Earn new weapons and upgrades, discover and master deep game mechanics. Scout the battlefield, secure the beachhead, and repel the invasion! Test your skills in Multiplayer Ranked Play!

Title: Sushi for Empress Setsuko
description: “Sushi for Empress Setsuko” is a cozy and comedic point & click adventure game and yuri dating sim set in a fantastical Japan-inspired land. Follow Mizumi Nagashima as she travels around the Empire, seeing gorgeous views, catching delicious fish, and charming beautiful women.

Title: Mathomatics
description: Runner puzzle on reaction speed and ability in mathematics. You control a cube that moves towards math blocks.

Title: Hei
description: Help Hei to find their path to the sacred tree! A point-and-click adventure game with lots of puzzles and a unique artistic style.

Title: Elves of Duty

Title: The Shape On The Ground (Steam Edition)
description: This software is not a game. A cross between a walking sim and a tarot card reading, TSOTG asks you to find 12 evocative dioramas and answer a single question : What do you see? Answer instinctively and receive one of five different endings and a final reading meant to stimulate self-reflection.

Title: Electronics Puzzle Lab
description: Enter the most advanced challenge laboratory of today's games, where electronics and logic merge into challenges that will captivate your mind and awaken the engineer within you!

Title: Chill IV
description: Chill is a relaxing, minimalist maze game.

Title: Abscission
description: Abscission is a Lovecraftian, story-driven horror point-and-click investigation game. It involves searching crime scenes for evidence, combining clues and questioning suspects. Puzzles can have multiple solutions as you guide the protagonist - Detective Will Stanhope - through the story.

Title: Leap of Love
description: Leap of Love is a fantasy game where you play as Kaheroux a frog turned prince by a shady wizard. The catch of that spell is that he needs to find and marry a princess within a month or go back to being a frog.

Title: Hypnosis Card
description: Hypnosis Cards is a deck-building game that introduces a novel concept of parts. Players can use numerous cards to engage in card battles with five girls.

Title: Jumanji: Wild Adventures
description: Explore Jumanji’s lost world of dangerous beasts and secret treasures.

Title: Max Payne 3
description: No longer a New York City cop, Max Payne moves to São Paulo to protect a wealthy family in an effort to finally escape his troubled past. This complete edition of Max Payne 3 includes the complete original game and all previously released downloadable content.

Title: Night Stroll
description: An ordinary girl named "Suzuki Rika" who can be found anywhere. It all started with an adult magazine, and the exhibitionism play began. From not wearing skirts to walking around completely naked, experiencing the pleasure of shame through exhibitionism.

Title: Sylphy and the Sleepless Island
description: One day, professional thief Sylphy learns of the mystical and valuable artifact of the Kingdom of Diezel, but the mission goes sideways and she ends up robbing the island of its night! She has one week to right her wrongs in this action-filled RPG!

Title: Millennium 2 - Take Me Higher
description: Can Marine, Benoit, Karine and her friends find 12 warriors to confront the 13 dreaded Lords of Mystrock? Will Jeanne the magical fairy still support them and unleash her devastating spells on the foes? Play Millennium 2, live the tale and find out!

Title: Ghostship Chronicles
description: Prepare to board the Heckel and Thomas as a Black ops CDF detachment who were sent to investigate the disappearance of the long lost colonization ship. Keep your team teammates alive to evolve more stories and stand a chance of survival with 3 different endings.

Title: Death Roads: Tournament
description: Combine deadly racing, deckbuilding, and roguelite style to get car battles unlike anything before! Choose a driver, car, weapons, and sponsors to overcome tactical encounters. Adapt to an ever-changing race to come out on top and earn entry into the last safe haven on the Divided States of America.

Title: Lisa and the Grimoire
description: Hoping to hit a big payday and pull herself from a life of poverty, Lisa heads to a town with a rumored demonic artifact. But upon arriving, she quickly realizes she has gotten herself into a dangerous situation.

Title: Millennium 3 - Cry Wolf
description: Time is running out for Marine and her friends. She needs to find warriors at all costs, but all she seems to stumble into is a mermaid, a werewolf, a dragon and hordes of crazy orcs... can you get her out of trouble, in one of the best episodes of the award-winning Millennium series?

Title: Ashmedai: Queen of Lust
description: Take control of Ashmedai in this turn-based Adult RPG as she fights through Hell to be acknowledged as the Queen of Lust! Don't mind her quirky behavior as she tries to seduce just about anything with pulse!

Title: TENSEI
description: An experience of self-discovery set in soothing Zen landscapes.

Title: C64 & AMIGA Classix Remakes Sixpack 3

Title: Ben 10
description: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max once again have their cross-country road trip in the Rust Bucket cut short by super villains and their evil, world-threatening plans. As Ben Tennyson, it’s up to you to save the world.

Craft a powerful deck that will get you through expansive dungeons filled with enemies and loot. Escape intact and take your riches with you to rebuild a once forgotten town.

Title: The Dead End
description: An ancient witch, a living dungeon, an undead curse, and a lost Holy Maiden. Greater men than you have fallen in the cursed dungeon of Witchhome. What awaits you in the depths? Fame? Or infamy?

Title: Millennium 4 - Beyond Sunset
description: A few days only are left to make the impossible possible... but now that Marine has combed the whole territory of Myst, chances to find the last few warriors wear really thin... or can she go on the track of the legendary man who calls himself The Bear, and boasts of incredible power?

Title: Dungeon Drafters
description: Dungeon Drafters is a mystery dungeon adventure set in a world where magic is cards, and cards are magic. Explore ancient ruins, loot rare cards and employ clever combos to defeat your foes and build the legendary spell deck that could save the world.

Title: Winter Memories
description: After the unforgettable summer memories you’ve made half a year ago, Yui, Rio, and Miyuki are back. With the change of seasons and the cold falling snow, a new page to your story is about to begin.

Title: The Triumphant Return of Diabolos
description: Many years after humanity came together to defeat the Demon Lord, a young man trained to become an imperial knight. One day, however, he was confronted by a mysterious figure who said, "We have been looking for you, Demon Lord Diabolos."

Title: Shera and the Three Treasures
description: After the rise of a new Demon Lord, it falls on the chosen hero from an ancient bloodline to stop them. However, due to a curse cast upon him, he must pass the task to his sister, Shera. Now she must gather the Three Treasures, and defeat the Demon Lord.

Title: Millennium 5 - The Battle of the Millennium
description: How can 13 peasants challenge 13 rich, powerful and well-educated martial artists? Enter the final, grandiose episode of a saga no stranger to the likes of Karate Kid, and carrying an uplifting message of hope, perseverence and friendship.

Title: Downroll
description: This is a miniature arcade platformer in which you have to control the ball.

Title: Hedgehot - Battle Strike
description: Turn-based strategy card game where you use different creatures and spells to defeat your enemies.

Title: Alice's Patchworks 2
description: Assemble patchwork mosaics, meet your favorite heroes from the world beyond the looking glass and help Alice become the queen!

Title: The Maiden, the Butler, and the Witch
description: Irina must leave home and complete her pilgrimage to become a full-fledged witch. However, the Demon Lord has built a castle on the island and summoned monsters threatening its citizens and her coming-of-age journey.

Title: Archipelago
description: Archipelago - is a fun game about pirate adventures.
genre: Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Dungeon Marathon
description: Dungeon Marathon is a new style of game where you must run through Dungeons, no fighting allowed!

Title: Astral Masters
description: Can you make a super mage? Play Astral Masters and explore your strategic thinking in a wide variety of matches with sneaky mages who know secrets. Elaborately themed environments, artful murals and vignettes will surprise you!

Title: 9 Till Void
description: 9 Till Void is a turn-based deckbuilding roguelike that features neither deck nor cards. As the newly-appointed Spellsword of these lands, you must fight your way through the corruption, with an arsenal of carefully chosen spells, to reach the source of darkness and destroy it from within.

Title: Lost Chapter
description: In the abyss, she is awakened by the cold. She has nothing to hold on to, as everything is left in the darkness. The girl moves on with a little light, and leaves all the choices to you. Guide her and find her lost self.

Title: Path to Warband
description: Unlock your inner strategist with this one-of-a-kind roguelike deckbuilder. A game like no other! Dive into the world of cards and strategy, and experience the excitement of a truly original gaming experience. Don't miss out!

Title: PRIMITIVE HEARTS
description: A voice calls out and four heroes hear its call. Can they rise to the challenge? Or will the Empire capture the land's Crystals and achieve their evil goals?

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Tenshouki with Power Up Kit HD Version
description: The 6th release of the "Nobunaga's Ambition" historical simulation game series has been reborn at the STEAM store as "Tenshouki with Power-up Kit HD Version." Players become the rulers of their clans and aim to unify the country under their leadership.

Title: The Symbiant Re:Union
description: Take a deep dive into Danya’s and Brahve’s heat and romance in The Symbiant Re:Union. The events take place after two Endings of The Symbiant’s main game.

Title: Infected Shelter
description: Infected Shelter is an ultra-violent rogue-lite post-apocalyptic beat'em up. Singleplayer and co-op for up to four players.

Title: Just Take Your Left

Title: 69 Ways to Kill a Zombie

description: Maintain a constant momentum of precision platforming through surreal worlds, filled with bright neon colors, and enjoy the intoxicating combination of 2D & 3D art! Explore and hunt collectables or knuckle-down and master satisfying mechanics to compete for the best times across the world!

Title: Schachkampf - Fantasy Chess
description: Solve more than 3.000.000 chess puzzles and fight an AI which is challenging for beginners and pros. Unlock different startign positions to give your chess game a new twist. All that in the style of famous 90s JRPGs.

Title: Tear and the Library of Labyrinths
description: The twin sisters Tear and Lumiere enjoy a happy life running their clinic. But when a demon abducts her sister, Tear must summon her courage to venture through worlds within magical tomes to bring her sister home safe.

Title: Circularity
description: Relaxing puzzle with interesting game mechanics - bring your character to the final portal which will transit you to the next level. You will need to move straight, avoid obstacles, jump through portals, ricochet from walls and a lot more.

Title: Project Hunt
description: It is a semi-realistic hunting game. Animals are shot and killed with guns. The shot review shows animal detail and the bullet's hit.

Title: Puzzle Car

Title: Caliper
description: All or something is preventing and helping, freezing and melting, braking and slipping, glowing and fading. The devices are subordinated with the common laws of a puzzle. That, that is melted that will not be frozen and will not swim. But there is something unfired that drowning and freezing. The Ice bridges are not for the fire coals.

Title: REINCARNATION ASURA ZALANDARA Journey of carnage and redemption
description: Fuckin' dress up roguelike shooter action game Zarandara is an action game in the style of a bullet-hell roguelike. The power of Shakti allows you to recover Mp through sexual intercourse, and when your climax gauge is at its maximum, your Hp and Mp are fully recovered.

Title: MotoGP™22
description: Engines running: give the green light to the most immersive and authentic MotoGP™ gaming experience ever. Virtual and Real have never been so near in MotoGP™22!

Title: Pile Up! Box by Box

Title: Xiangsheng Simulator

description: Bomber Fox is an action, sci-fi-themed game of the new generation, with an emphasis put into the dynamic gameplay, diverse level design, and innovative game modes.Play as Fox - the space cyborg, who has to win the grand robot-fighting tournament, to be granted a chance to go back home!

Title: Exit Limbo: Opening
description: Exit Limbo : Opening is the first chapter of a neo-retro side-scrolling beat ’em up with adventure elements, elaborated fighting mechanics, memorable enemies and a truly unique setting and visual art style

As if that isn't shocking enough, one of the dolls is a psychopathic killer who has her sights set on him! Will he survive or become another victim?

Title: Too White Basketball
description: Some fear the last Shot – Others live for It.

Title: Mr.Jezko
description: "Mr.Jezko" is a small hedgehog adventurer that collects fruits on numerous levels, full of dangers and predatory creatures. Solve the puzzles to collect all fruits and avoid traps.

Title: Quest Of Graal
description: Race in a platform game playable from 1 to 4 players in multiplayer.

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION
description: Nobunaga's Ambition, the first of the series, was released in 1983. Players assume the mantle of either Nobunaga Oda or Shingen Takeda and strive to conquer the entire land (17 areas in the Kansai and central Japan region). They manage their country to make it rich, then prepare their military forces.

description: Live the life of a starving artist in 19th century alternative history. Survive poverty, alchoholism, madness, depression, and 67 different feelings. Paint masterpieces by combining inspirations, sell them for riches (or scraps) and create a painting that will change the world.

Title: Amazing Trivia
description: Challenge your knowledge in the new exciting trivia game!

Title: Mini Madness
description: Mini Madness is an arcade racing game inspired by such titles as Re-Volt or Micro Machines. Players are racing on crazy, expanded vertically tracks placed in a single-family house and in its large garden, by taking control over miniature remote cars.

Title: Woodle Tree 2: Worlds
description: Woodle Tree 2: Worlds is an open world platformer/adventure videogame. This time the forces of evil are taking over the Wood Lands with a black substance that is absorbing energy and life from the living creatures! Will you be able to take over this enormous new evil force?

Title: Elite Fighter
description: This is a casual shooting game with the background of future space wars. Players need to fight to the death with many beautiful pilots.

Title: Siberian Dawn
description: Siberian Dawn is an original, solo, digital card game that combines the core soul of a deck builder with the tactical power of a war game and the strategic challenge of crisis management. Take on various objective based Missions as you defend the Union against the dangers of the cult of the Dawn.

Title: TacTac Prologue
description: Puzzle-adventure game with more than 20 different puzzles to solve, a unique artstyle and lots of charismatic characters to meet.

Title: Nexoria: Dungeon Rogue Heroes
description: NEXORIA — is a hardcore roguelike about dungeons with hybrid battles, combining classical turn based combat system and a collectible card game. Collect the best spells and conquer the dungeons!

Title: Tauren maze
description: 牛头人迷宫 / Tauren maze是一款主打迷宫探索类的闯关游戏,玩家需要不断探索迷宫找到出口，难度会随着关卡数上升。

Title: Kunoichi Botan
description: Botan, an apprentice kunoichi, is summoned by the village chief. Her master had been captured. So she is tasked with the mission to rescue her. However, Botan still lacks experience. Will she really be able to save her master?

Title: Edge of Reality
description: It seems that there can be no more boring profession in the world than a pawnshop appraiser. But a meeting with a mysterious but pretty stranger changes Dan's idea of his job.

Title: C-War 2
description: C-War 2 is a cartoon-based multiplayer game. Find Supply to survive. Fight against other Players with friends and save the loot four you. There is a big World wayting to get explored.

Title: Theatre of Doom
description: Theatre of Doom is an intense and fast top-down action game. Fight your way through the hellish stages against demonic marionette puppets, and ferocious monsters.

Title: One More Gate : A Wakfu Legend
description: One More Gate is a rogue-lite deck-builder that combines exploration and turn-based strategic combat. Head out to discover fantastic places, master the power of Wakfu to create destructive card combos, and defeat all those who would stand in your way!

Title: HopHeaders
description: We present you a miniature arcade clicker game about people with square heads jumping on platforms and avoiding obstacles.

Title: Re:DESTINY
description: This is a game that combines match-3 with light RPG elements, a GALGAME style of presentation with beautiful character. The story is strongly inspired by Japan mythology background and characters.

Title: Lewd Gym
description: In this gym, you will training with cute monster girls and accept the Orgasm control training.Fucking exciting, isn't it?

Title: Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness
description: 《Love n Dream: Virtual Happiness》is a card-based puzzle game with RPG components. Your job is to lead different girls to advance their adventure levels in a Virtual Reality Game.

Title: Christmas Puzzle 3
description: Help the Elf to prepare your town for Christmas with beautiful ornaments and decorations! Play through cool Match 3 levels, collect Santa’s coins and prepare the best Christmas fair ever!

Title: Nigate Tale
description: Fight your way through a procedurally generated labyrinthic castle in this rogue-like dungeon crawler, set in a vibrant and colorful anime world. You’re lost in a spiritual realm, but powerful monster girls will help you get back home with new powers and weapons if you bring them the right presents!
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Early Access

Title: Choppa
description: You are Rick Guiver, a reckless coast guard rescue helicopter pilot. A terrible oilrig catastrophe has happened in the coast! Against your superiors' orders and better judgement you jump in your helicopter and fly to the danger zone! There's no time to lose, save as many people as you can!

Title: Higgs Boson: Challenging Puzzle
description: Higgs Boson: Challenging Puzzle is a minimalist and challenging puzzle game where the player must rotate pieces considering the move limit to assemble a particle accelerator.

Title: Kamigami: Clash of the Gods
description: Easy to play, hard to master, join this adventure on an unique card game where you are able to do everything you ever wanted. Collect cards, build your decks, play offline on history mode, challenge your friends online or take on the world in a ranked system!

Title: Card Crawl
description: Card Crawl is a solitaire style Dungeon Crawler played with a deck of cards.

Title: Magna Fortuna
description: Ayana Tomori wishes for an escape from her regular life. One night, she's awoken by the sound of thunder, and a brilliant light envelops her. When her sight returns, she finds herself in a strange new world, where she's tasked with the role of a hero!

Title: Drums of War
description: Drums of War is a VR music-driven action adventure game that is a cross between Overlord and Donkey Kong Jungle Beat. Bang on a virtual drum kit to move your orc and unleash a powerful arsenal of weaponry.

Title: Monster Slayers
description: Monster Slayers is a rogue-like deck-building RPG adventure. Create a hero and choose your path through the perilous Northern Valley as you battle to become a true Monster Slayer.

Title: Geometric Feel the Beats
description: Have fun destroying your enemies in a reinterpretation of games from the 80s! To the sound of a mixture of unique musical genres, complete missions, improve your ship, be precise in your shots. All of this without worrying about GAME OVER! Show the world your score! Competition is what counts here!

Title: My Life as a Maiden
description: Having been enrolled into an all-girls school by his mother due to severe bullying for his feminine appearance, a 17-year-old boy spends the remainder of his high school life dressed as a girl to avoid being found out. He quickly becomes popular with many of the girls, much to his surprise.

Title: Shadows: Awakening
description: Shadows: Awakening is a unique, isometric single-player RPG with real-time tactical combat. You embark on an epic adventure with challenging gameplay, a gripping storyline and enchanting graphics.

Title: Alchemist Quest
description: A rising star in the Alchemists' Fellowship crashes back down to earth and now has to pick up the pieces and produce some results if she wants her job back! Will this alchemist complete her quest?

Title: Erannorth Chronicles
description: Erannorth Chronicles blends old-school card strategy with deep RPG progression in a vast sandbox world. With no fixed story, revel in unmatched freedom and limitless character customization.

Title: Ero Manager
description: As a new guy, he is so nervous to report to his direct boss that he has never met before, but he didn't expect it to be a stern female boss like a queen. But this is what it looks like, but in reality, no one knows about her inner feelings. Challenge her bravely, and you may find out her secret.

Title: Retro Kart Rush
description: Retro Kart Rush is a retro racing game that will transport you back to the 16-bit era. Where friendships were made (or broken) by playing multiplayer games in front of the TV.

Title: Arcanium: Rise of Akhan
description: Arcanium is an Open-world, Strategy Card Adventure that merges Roguelite and Deckbuilding genres like never before. Control your party of three heroes, craft your deck, unlock a vast amount of cards and items and save the world of Arzu from corruption!

Title: Railway Fugitive
description: Railway Fugitive is a railway shooting light ROGUE game. Players can freely combine skills by arranging cards. The player takes on the role of a resistance soldier who escapes the pursuit of artificial intelligence life enemies, fleeing along the railway line and defeating all the enemies.
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG

Title: The Addams Family: Mansion Mayhem
description: Help Wednesday, Pugsley, Gomez, and Morticia save the Addams Family Mansion in this hilarious 3D party adventure.

Title: In a search of a new home
description: Are you ready to enjoy the adventure of the fox and help him find a home? A lot of different locations, obstacles, enemies, nice music and other bonuses are waiting for you in this platform game!
genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy

Title: Strategic Command Classic: Global Conflict
description: The Matrix version is the Gold Edition of the original and includes the the two DLCs "Assault on Communism" and "Assault on Democracy". Players will be able to wage World War II across the massive expanse of the entire planet.

Title: Shapebreaker - Tower Defense Deckbuilder
description: A fusion of tower defense games and roguelike deckbuilders. Use your cards to build towers and to upgrade them in unique ways. Gain rewards to customize your deck, defense and playstyle. Break the shapes before they break you!

Title: Ring Runner: Flight of the Sages
description: Ring Runner combines the fast-paced action of space combat with the rich story and skill variety of an RPG.Trek across the universe in a 30 hour long story-driven campaign based on a companion Sci Fi novel, or challenge 6 scenarios alone, cooperatively, or competitively through local or online multiplayer.

Title: Meteorfall: Krumit's Tale
description: Krumit's Tale, the second game in the Meteorfall universe, is a new take on the deckbuilding roguelike genre. Use your cards to clear dungeons, then upgrade your deck with new cards and perks to press forward. The fate of the world is in your hands.

Title: Florida Love Stories
description: “Florida Love Stories is a romantic comedy point-and-click adventure and yuri dating sim. Play as investigative journalist Veronica Hernandez as she explores the town of Boca Castor, meets beautiful women and maybe even falls in love along the way.

Title: Ascension: Deckbuilding Game
description: Ascension: Deckbuilding Game is now available for your PC and Mac, complete with 9 full expansion decks! Play alone or with friends to battle against the Fallen One for honor and victory. Conceived and designed by Justin Gary, Ascension will provide hours of engaging and strategic game play for enthusiasts and experienced gamers alike.

Title: Crush the Industry

description: Help Mr. Run and Jump defeat the terrifying Void and collect all of the Power Gems from the Realms of Color! Venture through a dazzling and dangerous world, dodging countless enemies and conquering hundreds of fierce platforming challenges to save the day!

Title: Tango: The Adventure Game
description: A point & click adventure based on the legendary life of the greatest Tango singer, Carlos Gardel. With a strong grasp on Argentinean culture, it guides the player through a very charming story full of rich details of an early twentieth century Buenos Aires.

Title: 2014.Aftermath
description: Nevertheless, the world has perished. 35 years after the Nuclear Apocalypse, spent in the underground shelter, one of its inhabitants makes up his mind to find way out to the surface.

Title: ReBall
description: Welcome to the game ReBall. This is a minimalistic arcade puzzle game in the genre breakout.

Title: The Lotus Holidays
description: A stylish single player story-based game, where you win a free weekend at the "Lotus", a luxurious spa resort. But soon, things take a strange and sinister turn.

Title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers Rise of SH1FT3R
description: The criminal racing organization, SH1FT3R, is back! Use innovative gadgets and tear up the tracks in a globe-trotting tournament. Play as Tony Toretto and the Spy Racers in a bid to stop SH1FT3R from winning the ultimate high-tech vehicle!

Title: Call of Fries
description: Call of Fries is a comical fries simulator. Fun physical arcade with drawn graphics and excellent music. No blood - only ketchup!

Title: PAW Patrol The Movie: Adventure City Calls
description: Big city, bigger adventure! The PAW Patrol must save Adventure City from Mayor Humdinger’s selfish scheming – and they need YOU on Team PAWsome!

Title: Potion Paws
description: You’ve decided to take the risk and purchase a run down house in the middle of a spooky forest near a dungeon overrun with monsters.

Title: Steam: Rails to Riches
description: The official version of one of the best board games - Steam: Rails to Riches. Take control of a railway company, issue shares, build railroads, deliver goods along an network of tracks and stations and make profit to expand.

Title: Cards of the Dead
description: Cards of the Dead is a survival card game. Play your cards right and you might escape the zombie apocalypse!
genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy

Title: Paperback Adventures
description: Combine word wizardry and superior strategy in this roguelike deckbuilding adventure. Craft a unique deck of letter cards throughout each journey, collect rewards from your victories, and each adventure unlocks new cards.

Title: Thronefall
description: A minimalist game about building and defending your little kingdom.

Title: INFERNIUM
description: Infernium, a survival horror approach to Pac-Man. Dive in a non-linear beautiful portrait of hell, die in a prison without bars and overcome a brutal penitence. Also available on Switch and PS4!

Title: Trials of Guinevere
description: Trials of Guinevere combines strategic, turn-based combat with the emotional, character-focused storyline of a visual novel. In this high fantasy adventure, the heroes must band together to save their home, and their loved ones.

Title: Troy: The Malware Fight
description: 2D / 2.5D platformer about computer geek Troy. One day Troy unexpectedly detects a malware on his computer. This is where the great fight against the malware starts. After cleaning his computer Troy realizes that malware has spread all over his computer gadgets.

Title: Tina: Swordswoman of the Scarlet Prison
description: Play as Tina and Cecile as they investigate Durham and try to uncover the cause of the village's sudden surge of crime. With the reappearance of an old foe, their job won't be easy.

Title: Niels Penguin Adventure
description: Help Niels save his love, Lisa, from the cunning Professor Travis in this thrilling adventure game! Ready for an exciting chase with the villain?

Title: Metroplex Zero: Sci-Fi Card Battler
description: Neo-cyberpunk team card battler. Assemble a team that fits your playstyle to take on evil MegaCorps. Customize your decks and choose your cards wisely to defeat tough foes. Power up your heroes with cards, implants, and augments.

Title: Warlords Under Siege
description: Warlords Under Siege is a mix of RTS and Roguelike genre, where you build a small city and defend it against continuous waves of enemies. Improve your assortment of weapons with each playthrough, unlocking new possibilities to beat the ever-increasing threat.

Title: My Step Sisters
description: My step sisters - erotic visual novel, which accommodates all the secret dreams of every guy. In the game you can improve your communication, flirting skills and get to know female nature better.

Title: Dust to the End
description: Nuclear war ended human civilization, but it could never uproot the evil within our hearts. Fight, trade, negotiate, raid– do whatever it takes to survive in the wasteland. You will have to be as clever as ruthless to thrive in a broken world, torn by war, cruelty, hunger and slavery.

Title: Abyss Crew
description: Abyss Crew is a multiplayer coop game aboard a steampunk submarine. Each player is a member of the submarine crew - pilot, gunner, sonar, or engineer. Explore the abyss to find precious mineral - but beware, as sprawling menaces lurk in the darkness...

Title: Reign of the Renegade
description: Reign of the Renegade is a dice-based roguelite deckbuilder. Ascend the tower, brave the odds, and create powerful synergies. Will you end the Reign of the Renegade?

Title: Photogenic Minds : Identity
description: "デッキ構築型３D探索サイコホラー"。 PM0:00からAM0:00までの12時間を支配し、無限ループを抜けて死者の魂を捕獲して下さい。 使えるのはたった1つのカメラだけ。

Title: Nexus - The Jupiter Incident
description: At the dawn of the 22nd century, the conquest of space and the colonization of the solar system is being monopolized by several huge and ambitious mega-corporations. Although extremely delicate and vulnerable, a balance is maintained by these companies.

Title: runner
description: This is a motion capture game with a focus on parkour. The player's computer needs to be equipped with a camera to better experience the game. After starting the game, the camera will capture the movements of the human body in real time.
Publisher: 武汉亿鼎依本科技工作室

Title: Cadence Cuties
description: Rock out with one hand in this stunning rhythm game! Choose from exciting J-pop songs or groove to your own imported beat. Feast your eyes on exquisite girls and animations while the music takes you away.

Title: Escape from Fortress Lugohm
description: Aisha was on her way home after having completed a mission for the guild. But on her way back, she was caught by the infamous Count Lugohm. Will she be able to escape from the clutches of Count Lugohm? Find out in this Stealth Survival RPG!

Title: For The Warp
description: A roguelike deckbuilding game in space! Explore randomly generated systems, enemies and strange encounters. Build your deck, survive and reach For The Warp gate!

Title: Splody
description: The classic couch competitive gameplay of games like Bomberman brought into the modern era. Place bombs, get out of the way, destroy your friends, collect power-ups, 'splode your way to victory in smooth multiplayer with virtually unlimited local and online players!

Title: Alternate DiMansion Diary
description: A university student named Sae finds herself lost in the mountains. While searching for help, she comes across an old looking mansion and decides to enter it. However, there was more to this mansion than meets the eye. What will become of Sae? Find out in this Puzzle-Escape RPG!

Title: Labyrinthian Lockdown
description: Klondor is in grave danger of being overwhelmed, enter the Labyrinth, prepare your defences, defend your Mana Crystal and annihilate the incoming waves of enemy forces that pose a threat to the Kingdom.

Title: The spy who shot me™
description: The spy who shot me™ is a comedy retro FPS inspired by classic shooters of the 90s.

Title: Just Sign!
description: Just Sign! is a dynamic tower defense for 1 to 4 players. Mine, chop, refine, build turrets and refill them with ammo.

Title: The Queen of Blackwood High
description: The new girl, Brooke, has an unlucky start at Blackwood High when she accidentally makes enemies with the school's big, bad bully, Kendra. Despite not knowing her, Brooke has a feeling that there is more to Kendra than she's letting everyone else see and is determined to find out what it is.

Title: Super Kids Racing : Mini Edition
description: Super Kids Racing : Mini Edition offers wide variety of challenges which involves 5 different seasons with many different types of vehicles to choose from. Players will love to complete these challenges with their friends in split-screen multiplayer mode.
Publisher: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

Title: Apostle
description: 50 years have passed since the monsters last threatened humanity. In those years, life has returned to normal. However, this peace can't last forever. Play as Rei Yagami as his life is changed forever.

Title: Babycar Driver
description: Meet Babycar Driver!

Title: Predictors
description: Go solo or invite up to three friends to play this turn-based roguelike, where all characters move simultaneously. Fight against evil forces in the ever-changing Dark Forest. Learn skills: from Fire Magic to Necromancy. Get better loot. Change the difficulty. Repeat.

Title: RC Racing Off Road 2.0
description: Car racing but different. Enjoy the realistic RC car physics engine of these mini cars on different routes, in various lighting conditions, indoor and outdoor! Prove your driving skills early, so that you have soon enough money to buy new faster RC models and other routes.

Title: Thirty Two HardMod
description: Go on a little adventure with a yellow cube. This is a minimalistic platformer in which you have to collect coins on levels to get to the next level.

Title: Funk of Titans
description: As Perseus, the son of Zeus and protector of the Funk. Your task is to smash the rap, pop and rock of evil Musical Titans. Only one music can survive and the Funk is the music of the gods.

Title: Chop is dish
description: Chop is dish-2d-dimensional platformer, where you conroll an angry master-chef who was lost piece of meat-it was stolen. Looking in the root of their troubles hero plunges into the mysterious world of strange creatures, which is fraught with many traps and dangers.

Title: E.T. Armies
description: E.T. Armies is an action-packed, fast-paced, science-fiction first person shooter. The game takes place in a future where Earth has been reduced to ashes; It is now home to a new nation that hungers only for war. Prepare yourself to rise and defend against the invasion of the Forsaken.

Title: Heartless reseller is Roguelike
description: Roguelike action unfolds in supermarkets! We aim at the back of the dungeon while collecting various "resale items" in the supermarket. If you have some "resale items", the enemy "resale rogue" will attack the player and try to steal the "resale items". Timing is also important.

Title: A Raving Lunatic
description: This is a role-playing game. As our protagonist, you will lead your friends to fight for survival and pursue freedom!

Title: H Girl
description: Swap tiles to reveal 50 NSFW images. Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level. Completed puzzles can be viewed later in the gallery. Swap, match and have love!

Title: Warlocks Entanglement
description: Warlocks Entanglement puts you into a destructible open world in a magical medieval setting. Explore and learn all this world has to offer and then open a gateway to the next world!.

Title: Stuck In Time
description: A unique mix of adventure and idle game. Plan and optimise your loops carefully and let the grind happen automatically. Explore this unique world, meet strange characters and escape the loop. A high-quality idle game that elevate the mechanics through an old school pixel-art adventure.

Title: EdgeLords
description: Confront your sorceress rivals and claim their magical 'essence' for your own in this fully-animated and voiced hentai card game!

Title: The Soul Box
description: The Soul Box is a kinetic visual novel about the mystery of a puzzle box. A story of a heritage hidden behind what’s written. A different look at the future, a worried glance at the past.

Title: Holy Road
description: Protect your domain, develop and grow it, all while gaining wealth and power! Economically destroy everyone that stands in your way! Regain what was once yours and get your revenge in Holy Road!

Title: Rarity Chase
description: Rarity Chase is an adventure for board game fans. Quickly learn simple rules, roll the die and go in search of an ancient artifact. Find and wisely use resources and bonuses. Play alone against AI, with friends on the same computer or online.

Title: Strategic Command: American Civil War
description: For the first time in the series’ history, Strategic Command will be taking you to the 19th century battlefields of the American Civil War. You will control the armies, research, production and diplomatic policy of either the Union or the Confederacy during a time of innovation and dramatic battles.

Title: Denki Gaka's Bombshell
description: A fast-paced minesweeper game in 3D with classic and arcade style game play!

Title: Succumate
description: From the creator of Summer Memories comes a new game where you must look after a demon named Lilim! Now you must juggle your time to keep her happy... or else!

Title: SOS Zombie Survivors
description: SOS Zombie Survivors follows a group of survivors that fights waves of increasingly aggressive zombies while preparing for a rescue helicopter scheduled for evacuation a rescue point.

Title: Kandidatos Kart
description: The craziest race, with the fastest and most furious Kandidatos in Brazil.

Title: Tharaba
description: Dive into the exhilarating world of Tharaba, Time Each Hit Perfectly and compete for the highest score.

Title: Tide Up
description: Tide Up is a rather dark and gloomy adventure game. Accompany the girl in a dreamlike world of wonder. Collect the pearls scattered around the world and help the girl escape!

Title: Skycliffs
description: Skycliffs is an action shooter roguelike dungeon crawler with fast-paced top-down platforming. Jump and dash across sky islands, fight loads of monsters, and get upgrades to survive the many dangers of your journey. Will you be strong enough to reach and defeat the keeper of this floating world?

Title: Suicide Guy
description: Suicide Guy is set in the incredibile and extraordinary dreams of its protagonist. What would you do in order to save the thing you love most? Immerse yourself into his weird dreams and help him to wake up before it's too late.

Title: Flat Heroes
description: Dodge, jump, and dash your way through hundreds of terrifying geometric levels and epic bosses. Too tough? Bring your friends!

Title: Doll Explorer
description: Doll Explorer is a turn-based strategy game in which players conquer dungeons by combining various actions such as "take one step forward" and "attack in front of player". The adventures of Tia the witch, Doll the magical life form, and Lilith the princess of the demon tribe begin!

Title: Invasion, Tales of Tower Defense
description: Embark on an endless tower defense journey in "Invasion." Procedurally generated maps, unlimited levels, and strategic tower upgrades await. Defend against relentless waves and unlock a diverse array of towers. Your choices shape the fate of the realm!

Title: Mutropolis
description: MUTROPOLIS is a lovely sci-fi adventure set on the abandoned Planet Earth. Play as Henry Dijon (hero, nerd, detective) in search of a legendary lost city. Uncover weird ancient artifacts. And PLEASE don’t get obliterated by an ageless evil. You’ve been warned.

Title: Fairground Power Polyp Simulator
description: Always dreamed to be the operator of your favorite fairground ride? This is your change to take the control! Our Polyp Simulator will let you operate the ride completely yourself in a realistic way.

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Bushou Fuunroku
description: "NOBUNAGA’S AMBITION: Bushou Fuunroku" is the 4th in this orthodox simulation game series, released in 1990. The theme is "Culture&Technology." Tea ceremonies and the gathering of tea items add a cultural element, while the creation of guns and plated ships express the technology of the time.

Title: Star Stone Splash
description: Simple operation, extremely addictive. All you need to do is click, click, click.

Title: Spellinkers
description: A turn based strategy game, with some flavour of tower defense, RPG and luck games. But mostly a fun challenge! Be a master of fire, water, wind and earth while commanding mages and spellinkers of each element to defeat great armies of hommunculi.

Title: Jelly Brawl
description: Jelly Brawl is a sticky and destructive multiplayer party game where you gotta jiggle, flop, and pop your way to the top! Fight alone or against friends for freedom from a mad king across tons of stages, mini games, and modes as you wrestle to be the last jelly standing!

Title: Battles of Norghan
description: Battles of Norghan is a unique gladiatorial management and strategy game where you not only must recruit, train, and equip fantasy gladiators, but also control them on a tactical grid in turn-based combat.

Title: Need More Troops
description: Inspired by traditional turn-based fantasy strategies and modern auto battlers, we created the fast-paced rogue-lite game about growing a massive army against ever-increasing hordes of enemies. You should act wisely, though: the formation and battle plan are just as important as the army's size!

Title: Lost in Space: Madness
description: A sci-fi turn-based card strategy game in which you must guide your team of astronauts through horror, food shortages while maintaining their sanity, and uncover the mystery of the mission.

Title: Riverbond
description: Riverbond is a ‘shoot-and-slash’ dungeon crawler with solo and couch co-op play, set in a stunning voxel world.

Title: Aurion: Legacy of the Kori-Odan
description: How do you stay a good person when you are surrounded by centuries of hatred and selfishness? Find your answers in one of the best gaming story ever written about bravery, love and legacy.

Title: Ironclad Tactics
description: Ironclad Tactics is a fast-paced, card-based tactics game set in an alternate history Civil War - with steam-powered military robots!

Title: Verses of Enchantment
description: A magical card game where you duel wizards using AI generated poetry. Travel a rich world, meet fellow wizards, collect cards and build a deck that will inspire enchanting poetry! (All used poetry data is part of the public domain.)

Title: Dark Hero Party
description: Imos lives his peaceful life helping his sister Tori run a potion shop in a quiet village. However, when an order is given for all Dracovalis to hunt down the Demon Lord, that peace is shattered forever.

Title: Super Bullet Break
description: Save the world of online multiplayer games from a rogue AI in this deck-building strategy roguelite! Collect more than 160 cute and colourful Bullets as you move through maps based on iconic game genres and defeat enemies in challenging turn-based combat.

Title: Conquistadorio
description: The conquistador, who has faced many trials in his life, decided to retire and become a hermit. Just lying in his solitary cave away from people. But it seems that fate itself throws new challenges at you even in such a simple matter.

Title: Dungeons of Sundaria
description: Adventure through epic dungeons facing fearsome creatures either solo or with a group of friends. Master your class, loot everything, and destroy the foul creatures of the deep! Will you become a hero of legend?

Title: Shadow Brawlers
description: Shadow Brawlers is a local party game in which players control cute, agile ninjas that hide in the shadows. Surprise your opponents by appearing suddenly from the background; attack and disappear.

Title: Toadomination
description: Toadomination is a rogulite, bullethell, looter shooter game that takes you into an ancient confrontation that lasts more than a decade, in a battle between a toad and a viper. Equip yourself with the most powerful weapon, collect capital and meet face to face with the sworn enemy.

Title: Hentai Casual Slider
description: Enjoy this casual slider puzzle with dozens of nice illustrations for you to enjoy and relax. With an open gallery for simply relaxing and some nice voices too!

Title: Sweet House
description: This is a relaxing and casual little game. You need to help the beautiful girls to find their lost things.

Title: The Carrier and Crows
description: Crows have downed your plane and you are trapped at the far end of a remote peninsula in northern British Columbia. You must craft the necessary tools to contend with the local eccentrics and find your way back to civilization.

Title: Royal Defense
description: The castle needs a hero – hordes of trolls are surrounding it! Build towers, save money, learn spells - don't let the enemy in! Follow the exciting story of the dwarven kingdom's eternal struggle against the troll hordes, who want only to crush the dwarves and claim their territory.

Title: Help Me Doctor
description: Become a doctor! Help to diagnose patients. Be careful with the documentation, signatures etc. Decide what your ethics will be. What will you do, when a patient comes and say: Help me, doctor!

Title: Breaking Gates
description: Breaking Gates is a 2D side-scroller action RPG focused on fast-paced combat! You go on an adventure to save a threatened kingdom. Face challenges, defeat imposing creatures, forge equipment and master skills while exploring a map full of mysteries!

Title: The Plague Doctor of Wippra
description: The plague spreads agony and fear in the small town of Wippra. As a plague doctor, you bring healing and relief wherever you can. But ignorance, superstition, and religious zeal make for a deadly threat in this retro medieval medical adventure!

Title: Eschaton
description: Eschaton is a short, experimental, surreal first-person exploration game. Explore the 'aftermath' of a cult ritual in the grounds of a manor in the remote and picturesque Scottish highlands.

Title: BlackJack Math Cross Numbers
description: Tease your brain in this ambient logic game where you have to make the math match 21 as a result horizontal and vertically (because we're talking about blackjack, right?) Swap the cards, make the math, repeat. That's all you'll need in order to complete this game!

Title: Growth
description: Growth is a cozy, hexagonal-grid based soft-strategy game. Explore and populate a procedurally generated world by utilizing unique abilities of animals. Growth blends the beauty of cozy exploration with challenging navigation around obstacles.

Title: Cry Babies Magic Tears: The Big Game
description: Your favourite Cry Babies characters are ready to play! The Big Game is a friendly and fun adventure perfect for young players. Join Lady, Coney, Dreamy and friends in an all-new adventure as they take part in an exciting multi-stage tournament to win the fabled Golden Pacifier!

Title: Doomsday Paradise
description: Can you get a date before the end of the world? Doomsday Paradise is a goofy, multiplayer dating sim about finding love before the apocalypse. With over 100 different endings and 12 different singles to woo- no two games will ever be the same.

Title: Shipped
description: Challenge your friends in a naval battle of steering, pushing and shooting. Keep your ship on-screen and avoid crashing with land to survive. Up to 8 players.

Title: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Sengoku Gunyuuden
description: "Nobunaga's Ambition: Sengoku Gun'yuden" is the third in the series and was released in Japan in 1988 and later in the US as "Nobunaga's Ambition II." In this simulation game, players take on the role of a Daimyo of the Warring States period, attract followers, and use strategy and tactics to gain control of the 38...

Title: Rogue Cards
description: Rogue Cards is a roguelite deck builder, where every run is unique and long term strategy matters. Set in a randomized fantasy world, where death is only the next step to being a godlike deckmaster.

Title: Argonauts Agency: Missing Daughter
description: The Argonauts Agency – Find out how the family turmoil of the gods has affected common mortals and how it all ends!

Title: Freak Hunter A Retro Type
description: Embark on a nostalgic adventure with Freak Hunter A Retro Type and relive the excitement of old-school platform games. This unique game allows you to become a hunter in a world of zombies and mysterious creatures, whether in single-player or co-op mode.

Title: Ultimatum: Casting
description: We were given an Ultimatum. From whom and why? What is the task and what is the solution? If you accept the challenge, you can find out from the first part of the 3D multi-perspective escape room game series.

Title: ! That Bastard Is Trying To Steal Our Gold !
description: Steal gold from the Lerpikon's dungeons! Get rich!

Title: The Cathedral: Allison's Diary
description: Two years later from "The Hospital", you are interested in visiting the place where Rachel and Alfredo should have been buried. "The Cathedral" is the second chapter of the Allison's Diary horror saga. In the sacred cathedral of Sant'Andrea there is something frightening waiting to be discovered.

Title: Escape from GULAG
description: "Escape from GULAG" is the maze game that increases difficulty as you progress through the levels.

Title: Russian Train Trip 3
description: A first-person adventure game with a deep plot. You have to get from Tyumen to Novosibirsk on a passenger train. You can look out the window and watch the changing nature, weather and architecture. You can see forests, fields, mountains, cities and villages.

Title: GameGuru MAX
description: GameGuru MAX is a 3D game-maker that makes the creation of your game simple, quick and easy – no coding required! With all the tools and assets you need in one place you can start making your dream game in minutes! Dream it ∙ Build it ∙ Play it
genre: Animation & Modeling, Design & Illustration, Education, Software Training, Utilities, Game Development

Title: Sweet Desire 2
description: Sexy, hot and fascinatingly! «Sweet Desire 2» is a continuation of the acclaimed game «Sweet Desire». Hentai game for anime lovers is waiting for you!

Title: Doctor Who: The Edge Of Time
description: A new mysterious enemy threatens to tear apart the universe and only you can stop them! Doctor Who: The Edge Of Time lets players embark on an adventure through space and time. Travel across the universe, visit alien locations, pilot the TARDIS and solve the mystery of the controlling force behind the Reality Virus.

Title: Alwa's Awakening
description: Use your magic staff and progress through a large interconnected world where you'll solve puzzles, fight enemies and defeat bosses in order to help free the land of Alwa. Explore and uncover the secrets by using your platforming skills in this challenging and charming 8-bit adventure game.

Title: LuGame: Lunchtime Games Club!
description: A games club’s without members… or games?! Who is this crazy robot girl? Why am I being harassed by this cute bully? Life may not have a controller, but it certainly feels like a big game!

Title: Lord of the Click 2
description: Orcs,goblins and other evil spirits are getting closer, and very soon they will get so close that it will simply be impossible to get out of the kingdom. The king himself is ready to stop the army of dishonor. It will be difficult to determine how this battle will end if you don't help him!

Title: CrazyParty
description: It is a game where you move in a wide map in all directions using 12 cards of your choice, and play against or cooperate with other players to play mini games.

Title: Book of Demons
description: Book of Demons is a Hack & Slash in which YOU decide the length of quests. Wield magic cards instead of weapons and slay the armies of darkness in the dungeons below the Old Cathedral. Save the terror-stricken Paperverse from the clutches of the Archdemon himself!

Title: The Malice Kingdom
description: Explore an ancient world in The Malice Kingdom. Travel the rich and diverse landscape filled with ancient ruins, foreboding forests, and haunting mansions. Discover powerful weapons, befriend Whimsical characters, and uncover the dormant secret within the kingdom.

Title: Tamer Vale
description: Tamer Vale is a turn based card battler, where a collective of Elven heroines, known as Tamers, journey forth beyond the safety of their hidden valley to find and confront the sources of corruption in the land, and bring balance to it using their special rituals!

Title: Hexagon Ultra VR
description: Hexagon Ultra is a classic 3D adaptation of a popular game: Ataxx. Turn-based board games in different environments against talking AI enemies. Fill the board, outnumber the enemy for triumph. More than 30 levels have their unique path to win!

Title: Boxes: Lost Fragments
description: As a legendary thief, your next assignment lures you into a grand and lavish mansion. There you find a series of puzzle boxes, designed for an unknown purpose. What should have been a quick in-and-out, gradually turns into your own harrowing struggle for freedom and answers.

Title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Monsters Overboard
description: Dracula, Mavis and their monster friends are marooned on the mysterious Lost Islands – and only you, in command of lovable little creatures, the Impa, can save them! Explore the islands, discover new Impa abilities, and rescue Frankenstein, Murray and Wayne from fearsome enemies. But hurry – the Drac-Pack’s lives are at stake!

Title: Captain Forever Trilogy
description: Millions of players worldwide have flown, built, and fought their way through Captain Forever. CF Trilogy brings Captains Forever, Successor, and Impostor to Steam with a beautiful new renderer, new modules, and a reimagined world written by acclaimed novelist Cassandra Khaw.

Title: Winged Sakura: Endless Dream
description: Discover. Build. Defend. Survive. Escort. Open endless doors, discover endless new rooms, and defeat endless robots. Build towers, form contracts, gain new allies, and survive the Endless Dream.

Title: Shogun Showdown
description: Shogun Showdown is a turn-based combat game with rogue-like and deck-building elements. Position yourself and attack at the right time, upgrade your tiles and combo them to get ready to face the Shogun!

Title: Olho Adventure
description: The objective of the game is to defend your planet from invaders, each defeated boss releases a different new power, adventure game, 2d platform action.

Title: Suzerain
description: Assume the role of President Anton Rayne and guide the nation of Sordland. Amidst brewing international conflicts, need for reform, deep-seated corruption, and economic recession, you must make the decisions in this political drama. How will you lead?

Title: Violet Bricks
description: Violet Bricks is an exciting puzzle game with modern 3D graphics. Help Violet defeat alien robots across dozens of challenging levels and collect power-ups to become stronger. A game that offers modernized nostalgic fun!

Title: Samurai Vandalism
description: The land of Yamato is filled with cruel rebels, oppressive nobles, and dangerous monsters. Fight as a Hozuki samurai to bring justice to the land!

Title: Ooglians
description: Ooglians are coming! Nothing excites an ooglian more than smashing machinery. Protect your machinery with more machinery which attracts even more ooglians. How unfortunate.

Title: Unrestricted Pest Control
description: U.P.C. is a top-down shooter where you play as a fearless exterminator to solve a small bug problem at a nuclear research facility. With the rogue-lite elements, you must choose your path to the upper floors carefully, while trying to bug fixing in the facility.

Title: Green Project
description: Post apocalyptic survival farming, green the world to survive !

Title: Fleeting Iris
description: Ayame is a beautiful girl from Japan that is living a carefree life in search of happiness. One fateful day, she met Robert, a CIA agent who was in Japan during a mission. They become engaged and move to America together. However, not all is as simple as her previous life!

Title: TeamTower
description: As a prophet of the Secret Church, you will lead a team of characters with unique characteristics. Gain loot through events and battles, use them to enhance the team, and finally complete the great sacrifice.
genre: Adventure, Indie, RPG, Strategy, Early Access

Title: Krek Da Frog
description: Funny and relaxing game, player can control the frog he choose in menu select unlocked level and complete eating missions on multiple locations. To achieve all achievements player must eat at least 500 butterflies and open all levels.

Title: Race & Destroy
description: Race&Destroy is an alternative view of racing genre in total. Earn money, upgrade and repair your car or buy a better car.
genre: Action, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation, Sports

Title: Chevalier Historie
description: The fate of a captured princess lies in the hands of a single woman. Using the power of the spirits and a variety of items, the female knight Jeanne must explore the kingdom that's been thrown into chaos to save Princess Lily in this classic-style action RPG.

Title: GuardGrave
